public class ControllerClass
extends java.lang.Object

      • getFilteredWithPost

        @RequestMapping(value="/data",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> getFilteredWithPost​(@RequestBody
                                                                                     java.lang.Object filter)
                                                                              throws org.springframework.expression.spel.InternalParseException,
                                                                                     FilterNotFoundException,
                                                                                     FilterIllegalArgumentException,
                                                                                     InternalGeneralException
        Risponde alla richiesta POST /data
        Parameters:
        filter - filtro che deve essere passato dal body
        Returns:
        un ArrayList di tweet filtrato
        Throws:
        org.springframework.expression.spel.InternalParseException
        FilterNotFoundException
        FilterIllegalArgumentException
        InternalGeneralException

      • getStatsWithPost

        @RequestMapping(value="/stats",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> getStatsWithPost​(@RequestBody
                                                                                  java.lang.Object filter)
                                                                           throws InternalGeneralException,
                                                                                  StatsNotFoundException,
                                                                                  FilterNotFoundException,
                                                                                  FilterIllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        filter - filtro riguardante l'utente che ha creato il tweet
        Returns:
        ArrayList contentente frequenza per utente di hashtag
        Throws:
        InternalGeneralException
        StatsNotFoundException
        FilterNotFoundException
        FilterIllegalArgumentException
